question: Aniline does not undergo
explanation: Aniline does not undergo Friedel-Crafts reaction.
This is because aniline is a Lewis base (due to the lone pair on Nitrogen) and reacts with the Lewis acid catalyst (<katex>$AlCl_3$</katex>) used in Friedel-Crafts reactions to form a salt.
This deactivates the benzene ring towards electrophilic substitution.
